name: CyberCrunch
description:
OMG ! The game you are working on is released in two weeks and it can't be postponed again ! Prepare for some crunch days... And try not to fall asleep !

=====

This game was created in two days for the Mini Jam 68 ! The theme was "sleep" and the limitation was "no text"

Programmers :

  • Elioth Bénard (UI gameplay)
  • François Duprez (Music integration)
  • Quentin Ferragu (Main menu & Character animation)
  • Vincent Debuissy (UI gameplay)

Graphic Artists :

  • Simon Garnier (Nearly everything)
  • William Moiriat (Colorization & helped on UI)

Musics :

  • Adam Buchanan (Musics composition)
